document_data.name: Sweelfire Ice
document_data.mainbody:
'''Sweelfire Ice''' was a chilled dessert dish from the city of [[Velen]] in the nation of [[Tethyr]].

{{quote|''A mouthful of bliss!''|[[Volothamp Geddarm]]}}
document_data.Description: A simple delight of a cupful of ice, topped with cream and then topped with sweet [[tamarind]] sauce.
document_data.History: As of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Sweelfire Ice could be found on [[Blackthorn's Brew]]'s menu, a [[festhall]] on the [[Captain's Cliff]] in Velen. The dish was mentioned among other notable foods included in Volothamp Geddarm's published guide to [[Amn]] and Tethyr.
